name: PH - Pag-Ibig Contribution
query:
SELECT
    id.identification_number AS 'Pag-ibig MID No.',
    last_name AS `Last Name:Data:100`,
    middle_name AS `Middle Name:Data:100`,
    first_name AS `First Name:Data:100`,
    COALESCE(SUM(sd.amount), 0) AS `Employee Share:Currency:100`,
    COALESCE(SUM(sder.amount), 0) AS `Employer Share:Currency:100`,
    COALESCE(SUM(sd.amount), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(sder.amount), 0) AS `Total Amount:Currency:100`,
    MONTHNAME(ss.posting_date) AS `Month Covered:Data:100`
FROM
    `tabEmployee` emp
LEFT JOIN
    `tabEmployee Identification Document` id ON
        id.parent = emp.name AND
        id.type = 'HDMF ID'
INNER JOIN
    `tabSalary Slip` ss ON
        ss.employee = emp.name AND
        MONTHNAME(ss.posting_date) = %(month)s AND
        YEAR(ss.posting_date) = %(year)s
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSalary Detail` sd ON
        sd.abbr = 'PH_HDMF' AND
        sd.parent = ss.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSalary Detail` sder ON
        sder.abbr = 'PH_HDMF_ER' AND
        sder.parent = ss.name
GROUP BY
    MONTHNAME(ss.posting_date), YEAR(ss.posting_date), emp.name
HAVING
    SUM(sd.amount) > 0 OR SUM(sder.amount) > 0;
